name: The Tale of the Breakfast Monster
name_original: The Tale of the Breakfast Monster
description:
The theme for December's Bitsy Jam was egg,  so of course we decided to go with a small battle against literal breakfast come to life!

Just move the arrow to go on with the story and to select the attacks that you want to launch against your savoury enemy. There are four endings to this battle: which one will you unlock? 

Let's get crackin'! We'll see ourselves out...

As usual our thanks to the people who made this game possible!

  • Bitsy Game Maker was made by Adam Le Doux 
  • Image to Bitsy is a wonderful tool by itch.io user ruin
  • Bitsy Saviour is a tool created by itch.io user aloelazoe
